about_the_game:
Dig up graves to steal from the dead while you escape graveyard security and run from the legendary Oldlake Wendigo.

Gameplay:


  • Dig up graves!
  • Low poly PS1 style
  • Survive terrifying monsters
  • Discover hidden secrets
  • The continuation of Convenient


Survive


Quickly DIG GRAVES and RUN for your life before security catches you. You're at the Oldlake Cemetery to loot graves and make some money. Find the gravestones with the names written in your notebook and dig them up while staying out of sight. If you are spotted, make quick decisions while being chased to survive. Find hiding spots and stay out of sight until the coast is clear. Security guards aren't the only thing you'll be running from so keep your eyes peeled.


Solve The Mystery



Find VHS tapes around the graveyard to uncover the mystery hiding in the cemetery. Instead of watching VHS tapes, you live them. Solve puzzles and experience the story yourself. You may be a grave robber, but there's more going on here than just a few missing bodies. Discover the birth of the Oldlake Wendigo and how to stop it.



The origins of Convenient, the short horror game made by LunaApps.

content_descriptors.notes: Fiend has low-poly blood, gore, violence, and jump scares
